title: The Seventh Commandment - Tom Fox [EN EPUB] [ebook] [ps]
description:
The Seventh Commandment by Tom Fox
English | 2017 | Mystery, Thriller | EPUB | 2 MB


Fans of Simon Toyne and Dan Brown will be gripped by The Seventh Commandment, the electrifying new conspiracy thriller by Tom Fox, author of Dominus.
N ot every curse is ancient. Not every prophecy is true. Not every fraud is what it seems.
The Eternal City is about to become a hotbed of chaos…
The River Tiber will run red with blood.
The hills of Rome will be cloaked in darkness.
A deathly fog will stalk the streets.
And that is just the beginning.
Seven predictions the world is calling prophecies, and the clock is ticking.
But can any of it be real?
As the world watches on, it is up to Akkadian specialist Angelina Calla and Vatican expert Ben Verdyx to find out. In a race where every secret conceals a lie and the strange verses of an ancient stone seem to hold the answers, the real question is, can the terrifying truth be unraveled before their time runs out?

Enjoy and please SEED!!!
